name: Bone Oblitum
description:
A war between flesh and bone is raging, utilizing ancient sorcery that is fracturing the land - embark on a quest to discover the source of this conflict and put an end to it.
In Bone Oblitum you'll explore a large overworld full of dungeons, bosses, secrets, side quests, & puzzles.

Game by Siltocyn: Twitter

Music by Onzerc: Soundcloud

If you wish to support development, consider donating to the Bone Oblitum Patreon

You can also join the Discord
